name: backend_server_url
label: WoodsPortal Admin URL
help_text: Paste the WoodsPortal Admin URL here
inline_help_text: Click here to set up WoodsPortal and connect with our server.

name: page_editor_preview_
label: Enable Dashboard Preview
inline_help_text: Please disable the preview before Publishing

name: add_home_tab
label: Enable Dashboard

children.help_text: Customize Dashboard Tab Settings

children.label: Tab Name
children.help_text: Enter the name of the tab as it will appear in the sidebar menu.

children.label: Object Name
children.help_text: Specify the object name to display in the dashboard view.

children.name: mediator_object_type_id
children.label: Show Primary Company Associated Data
children.help_text: Enabling this, table will display only the objects which are associated with the primary company.

children.name: add_specific_pipeline
children.label: Filter By Pipeline
children.help_text: Enabling this allows you to filter table data by a specific pipeline.

children.label: Associated Object Type Id
children.help_text: Provide the unique Associated  Object Type ID to link the correct data.

children.label: Object Type ID
children.help_text: Provide the unique Object Type ID to link the correct data.
children.inline_help_text: Visit here to view the complete list of Object Type IDs

children.name: icon_svg_code
children.label: Icon SVG Code
children.inline_help_text: You can search SVG Here and copy only the SVG start to end and paste it here.

children.label: Property Name
children.help_text: To display multiple values in the iframe, please separate the URLs with a comma in HubSpot.

children.label: Greeting Card
children.help_text: These details will be displayed on the dashboard greeting card

children.name: title
children.label: Title
children.help_text: To display a dynamic value, please copy the label from the admin properties table and paste it between asterisks, like this: **label**.

children.label: description
children.default:

work is shaping results, **firstname**. Let’s align actions with goals for maximum impact.

children.name: add_company_card

children.help_text: This will enable the company card next to the Greeting Card on the dashboard

children.inline_help_text: These properties will be displayed on the Company card

children.name: properties
children.label: Enter Properties to Show on Card
children.help_text: These properties will be displayed on the Home Company card.
children.inline_help_text: If not displayed, please enable visibility in the admin panel for the property you have entered.

children.label: Property Internal Name
children.help_text: Enter the property name to show on the company card

children.name: add_details_modal
children.label: Add Details Modal
children.help_text: Enabling this toggle will add a button to the company card, allowing users to view all company properties that are set to display in the admin properties table.

children.label: Property Name
children.help_text: To display multiple values in the iframe, please separate the URLs with a comma in HubSpot.
